definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism

sentences.english: In this way, the divergences between relevant documents can be interpreted easily.
sentences.chinese: 如此，則相關文獻記載的分歧與矛盾可以渙然冰釋。

sentences.english: The misunderstanding between us has been cleared up.
sentences.chinese: 我們之間的誤會渙然冰釋。
